title: Executor non application reason
question: Why is {executorName} not applying for probate?
optionPowerReserved: {executorName} is reserving the right to apply later (also known as holding ‘power reserved’)
optionPowerReservedHint: You will need to inform them in writing that you are making this application.
optionRenunciated: {executorName} is giving up their right to apply permanently (also known as ‘renunciation’)
optionRenunciatedHint: You will need to send us their completed PA15 renunciation form (opens in a new tab) or their PA17 renunciation form if they are a probate practitioner (opens in a new tab), along with your other documents.

notApplyingReason.required: Select a reason why {executorName} is not applying
